<script>
  
  url=document.URL;
 
  if(url.search("/ingenieria/") !=-1 || url.search("/licenciatura/") !=-1 || url.search("/maestria/") !=-1 || url.search("/prepa/") !=-1 || url.search("/especialidad/") !=-1)
  {
    if(validator!="firedTag_02")
      {
  		urlPathName=window.location.pathname;
    	urlPathName=urlPathName.replace(/\//g,"");
    	urlPathName=urlPathName.replace(/-/g," ");
    	dataLayer.push({"flc-departamentoVariable":urlPathName, event:"fireTag_02"});
        validator="firedTag_02";
        
      }
    
   }
  
  
</script>

<script>
  
  url=document.URL;

  
  if(url.search("/campus-")!=-1)
  {
  	item=document.getElementsByClassName("cont-linea-title ln-content");
    if(item.length !=0 && item[0].textContent !="")
    {
        validator=document.getElementById("frmTradicional");
      if(validator.hasAttribute("style") && (validator.getAttribute("style")=="display: none;" || validator.getAttribute("style")=="display:none;"))
        {
    		carreraVariable=item[0].textContent;
        	carreraVariable=carreraVariable.toLowerCase();
        	dataLayer.push({"flc-carreraVariable":carreraVariable, event:"fireTag_03"});
        }
        
      
    }
  }
  
  
  
  
</script>

<script>
  
  url=document.URL;
  
  
  if(url.search("/ingenieria-") !=-1 || url.search("/licenciatura-") !=-1 || url.search("/maestria-") !=-1 || url.search("/prepa") !=-1 || url.search("/especialidad-") !=-1)
  {
      
  		urlPathName=window.location.pathname;
    	urlPathName=urlPathName.replace(/\//g,"");
    	urlPathName=urlPathName.replace(/-/g," ");
    	dataLayer.push({"flc-carreraVariable":urlPathName, event:"fireTag_03"});
        
    
   }
  
  
</script>
